articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Roaring In US Backyard, Meet ‘Crown Jewel’ Of Russian Navy, ‘Silent Killer’ Kazan Submarine Stationed In Cuba - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Ahead of their arrival in Cuba, the Russian missile frigate Admiral Gorshkov and the nuclear-powered Yasen-class cruise missile submarine Kazan conducted military drills in what has been deciphered as a message to the West amid rising tensions. Russian Engine…
